data.name: Crabrawler
data.flavorText: It punches so much, its pincers often come off from overuse, but they grow back quickly. What little meat they contain is rich and delicious.

data.name: Grubbin
data.flavorText: They often gather near places frequented by electric Pokémon in order to avoid being attacked by bird Pokémon.

data.name: Popplio
data.flavorText: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.

data.name: Alolan Meowth
data.flavorText: This Pokémon was not originally found in Alola. Human actions caused a surge in their numbers, and they went feral. They're prideful and crafty.

data.name: Rowlet
data.flavorText: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

data.name: Litten
data.flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.

data.name: Cosmog
data.flavorText: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

data.name: Cutiefly
data.flavorText: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it's able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

data.name: Alolan Diglett
data.flavorText: Its head sports an altered form of whiskers made of metal. When in communication with its comrades, its whiskers wobble to and fro.

data.name: Pikipek
data.flavorText: This Pokémon feeds on berries, whose leftover seeds become the ammunition for the attacks it fires off from its mouth.

data.name: Yungoos
data.flavorText: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.
